about_the_game:
2099. You are the head of Meaning Intelligence in the city of Mulk, the last city on Earth. Find a way out of the crisis in which the city finds itself. Only you decide whether it will have a future. The city has reached outstanding technological heights, but its inhabitants have lost the meaning of life. Should you try to save the city or let it perish?

Travel to the Valley of Mists - a mysterious dreamlands space beyond space and time. Study the dreams of the key citizens and influence their fate through the mystical monoliths located in the Valley.

Features:

  • 3D first-person adventure game.
  • A meditative, thoughtful journey without violence, monsters or jump scares. Leave the hectic world for a while and return to yourself.
  • Atmosphere inspired by the works of David Lynch and Howard Phillips Lovecraft.
  • Rare achievements related to the search for secret knowledge.
  • Picturesque valley created on Unreal Engine 5.
